pkgmetadata.longdescription: Information Security Quantified Risk Assessment Toolkit // An open source information security strategic risk analysis toolkit based on the OpenFAIR taxonomy https://www2.opengroup.org/ogsys/catalog/C13K and risk assessment standard https://www2.opengroup.org/ogsys/catalog/C13G. Empowers an organization to perform a quantifiable, repeatable, and data- driven review of its security program.
